movie.title: Hope Floats
movie.description_intro: Birdee Calvert-Pruitt is back in her hometown of Smithville, Texas, after discovering that her husband is having an affair with her best friend, Connie. The entire town knows what happened to flawless beauty Birdee since Connie let her know about the affair on a national talk show. Back in town, she's dealing with catty old friends and acquaintances from high school who can't help rubbing it in her face that she isn't as perfect as she thought while still trying to get back on her feet with her daughter, Bernice. Deeply depressed, she runs into an old friend, Justin Matisse, who tries to help her through, but is still in love with her. Birdee must make a new life for her and her daughter, but will Justin be able to be part of it?
movie.description_full: Birdee Calvert-Pruitt is back in her hometown of Smithville, Texas, after discovering that her husband is having an affair with her best friend, Connie. Deeply depressed, she runs into an old friend, Justin Matisse, who tries to help her through, but is still in love with her. Birdee must make a new life for her and her daughter, but will Justin be able to be part of it?

movies.title: It's Not the Size That Counts
movies.title_english: It's Not the Size That Counts
movies.title_long: It's Not the Size That Counts (1974)
movies.summary: Percy, the man with the world's first penis transplant, discovers that there is a chemical in the city's water that makes men impotent.
movies.description_full: Percy, the man with the world's first penis transplant, discovers that there is a chemical in the city's water that makes men impotent.
movies.synopsis: Percy, the man with the world's first penis transplant, discovers that there is a chemical in the city's water that makes men impotent.

movies.title: Manikarnika: The Queen of Jhansi
movies.summary: Manikarnika born in Varanasi when Dixt a minister in Jhansi princely state sees her he proposes her marriage to Gangadar Rao prince of Jhansi.Sadashiv Rao plots along with British officers to conquer Jhansi as he Is promised a stake in it after conquering Jhansi.After the birth of Lakshmi and Gangadar Rao's son Sadashiv Rao sees his place in fear and poison the holy water during the naming ceremony of the child following which he passes away and also leaves Gangadar Rao on death bed.Gangadar Rao decides to adopt a son and Sadashiv Rao feels guilty of not adopting his son instead a toddler who comes running to Lakshmi Bai.After death of Gangadar Rao.The East India Company decides to conquer on Jhansi as there is no male ruler.But Lakshmi Bai decides to take the throne on herself and fight for Jhansi.
movies.description_full: Manikarnika born in Varanasi when Dixt a minister in Jhansi princely state sees her he proposes her marriage to Gangadar Rao prince of Jhansi.Sadashiv Rao plots along with British officers to conquer Jhansi as he Is promised a stake in it after conquering Jhansi.After the birth of Lakshmi and Gangadar Rao's son Sadashiv Rao sees his place in fear and poison the holy water during the naming ceremony of the child following which he passes away and also leaves Gangadar Rao on death bed.Gangadar Rao decides to adopt a son and Sadashiv Rao feels guilty of not adopting his son instead a toddler who comes running to Lakshmi Bai.After death of Gangadar Rao.The East India Company decides to conquer on Jhansi as there is no male ruler.But Lakshmi Bai decides to take the throne on herself and fight for Jhansi.

movies.title: Healing River
movies.summary: A woman's only son is killed by an opiate-addicted driver. Her grief turns to rage when the court system fails her and, desperately seeking justice, she pursues him. Their confrontation reveals more than they ever could have imagined.
movies.description_full: A woman's only son is killed by an opiate-addicted driver. Her grief turns to rage when the court system fails her and, desperately seeking justice, she pursues him. Their confrontation reveals more than they ever could have imagined.
movies.synopsis: A woman's only son is killed by an opiate-addicted driver. Her grief turns to rage when the court system fails her and, desperately seeking justice, she pursues him. Their confrontation reveals more than they ever could have imagined.

movies.title: The Oranges
movies.summary: In conservative West Orange, New Jersey, the Ostroff and Walling families are very close. David Walling and Terry Ostroff are inseparable best friends and run together everyday. David has problems with his wife, Paige. He frequently sleeps alone in his office. Their daughter, Vanessa, is frustrated because she has not succeeded in her career as a designer. Their son, Toby, is moving to China on a temporary assignment. Terry's wife, Cathy, ignores him. Their daughter Nina moved to San Francisco five years ago. Near Thanksgiving, Nina's boyfriend Ethan betrays her at his birthday party and Nina returns to her parents house. Nina argues with her mother and draws closer to David. Soon they have an affair and fall in love, turning the lives of the people close to them upside-down.
